original_title: Cult Of Luna - Years In A Day
overview: Years in a Day is a two-hour performance recorded in Paris at La Gaîté Lyrique, making the set a must for Cult of Luna completists. The set includes excellent videography, A-game band performances, and shots that alternate regularly between close-ups of band members and wide shots of the band from out in the crowd.
tagline: Live At La Gaîté Lyrique PARIS.
title: Cult Of Luna - Years In A Day
